contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No.785-2018 to designate 276 Forest Hill Road (Alfred D. Morrow House) (St. Paul’s, Ward 22) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: CC41.11 - 276 Forest Hill Road - Conservation Review Board Appeal - Designation under Part IV of the Ontario Heritage Act
TE20.12 - Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act - 276 Forest Hill Road
Bylaw 785-2018 - To designate the property at 276 Forest Hill Road (Alfred D. Morrow House) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 785-2018 - 276 Forest Hill Road (Alfred D. Morrow House)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
